Uses of Interface
org.jasig.cas.authentication.CredentialMetaData

  • Packages that use CredentialMetaData 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication
    Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request.

    • Uses of CredentialMetaData in org.jasig.cas.authentication

      Classes in org.jasig.cas.authentication that implement CredentialMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCredential
      Base class for CAS credentials that are safe for long-term storage.
      class  BasicCredentialMetaData
      Basic credential metadata implementation that stores the original credential ID and the original credential type.
      class  HttpBasedServiceCredential
      A credential representing an HTTP endpoint given by a URL.
      class  OneTimePasswordCredential
      Describes a one-time-password credential that contains an optional unique identifier and required password.
      Methods in org.jasig.cas.authentication that return CredentialMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CredentialMetaData HandlerResult.getCredentialMetaData() 
      Methods in org.jasig.cas.authentication that return types with arguments of type CredentialMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<CredentialMetaData> Authentication.getCredentials()
      Gets a list of metadata about the credentials supplied at authentication time.
      List<CredentialMetaData> AuthenticationBuilder.getCredentials()
      Gets the list of credentials that were attempted to be authenticated.
      List<CredentialMetaData> ImmutableAuthentication.getCredentials() 
      Methods in org.jasig.cas.authentication with parameters of type CredentialMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationBuilder AuthenticationBuilder.addCredential(CredentialMetaData credential)
      Adds metadata about a credential presented for authentication.
      Method parameters in org.jasig.cas.authentication with type arguments of type CredentialMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationBuilder AuthenticationBuilder.setCredentials(List<CredentialMetaData> credentials)
      Sets the list of metadata about credentials presented for authentication.
